title: Nwada001
author: Nwada001
content: Hello, my bitcointalk family, I Am kind of new here, have come across threads that celebrate our great forums anniversary every 23rd of October, correct me if you may, If am correct Happy Anniversary to Bitcointalk and my forum members. Have learned a lot and still acquiring more knowledge.Am happy to be part of this great family

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: You're a month too early, here's satoshi's announcement of the opening of bitcointalk: http://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5.msg28#msg28I wonder where you got Oct23?

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I know that October is a significant month for Bitcoin, but like @nc50lc observed, you are quite early to the party.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Op, I see you registered since 06 July 2022, if I'm not mistaken, you've been on this forum for 3 months 17 days. This should be your first post since joining the forum. I am very surprised by your statement that you have found the thread celebrating the Forum's birthday every October 23, which is where you found it. @nc50lc corrected what's wrong with your statement, you're celebrating a bit early.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: This will be a 13th year of this forum, does it tells something especially with the trend?  Anyway, still have a month for Anniversary let’s just wait and see if Theymos will have another round of art contest or any contest in relation to Anniversary, I guess it’s worth to celebrate.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: You might have come across different thread in which 23rd October might have been mentioned but I don't see any relation of this date with forum and with your question the doubt and misunderstanding had been already cleared above.To celebrate the anniversary there are some art events organised by @theymos on forum in which you can take part and enjoy as well with others but can you link up thread where you have seen the 23 October refrence to check what you have seen?
